channel.title: CVE Feed for WPWeb -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPWeb -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47369|2024-10-07T13:14:35.204Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPWeb Social Auto Poster allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Social Auto Poster: from n/a through 5.3.15.

item.title: CVE-2024-7503|2024-08-13T15:18:37.863Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 2.7.5. This is due to the use of loose comparison of the activation code in the 'woo_slg_confirm_email_user' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, such as an administrator, if they have access to the userID. This requires the email module to be enabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-43131|2024-08-13T15:50:26.192Z -- wpweb -- docket%20%28woocommerce%20collections%20%2F%20wishlist%20%2F%20watchlist%29
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in WPWeb Docket (WooCommerce Collections / Wishlist / Watchlist) allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Docket (WooCommerce Collections / Wishlist / Watchlist): from n/a before 1.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-43131|2024-08-13T10:56:02.025Z -- wpweb -- docket%20%28woocommerce%20collections%20%2F%20wishlist%20%2F%20watchlist%29
item.description: Incorrect Authorization vulnerability in WPWeb Docket (WooCommerce Collections / Wishlist / Watchlist) allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Docket (WooCommerce Collections / Wishlist / Watchlist): from n/a before 1.7.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-37502|2024-08-02T03:57:39.410Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20social%20login
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in wpweb WooCommerce Social Login.This issue affects WooCommerce Social Login: from n/a through 2.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-6750|2024-07-26T20:40:10.245Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: The Social Auto Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access, modification, and loss of data due to a missing capability check on multiple functions in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.14. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to add, modify, or delete post meta and plugin options.

item.title: CVE-2024-6752|2024-07-24T18:38:17.478Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: The Social Auto Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘wp_name’ parameter in the 'wpw_auto_poster_map_wordpress_post_type' AJAX function in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.14 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5871|2024-07-24T13:29:10.012Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.2 via deserialization of untrusted input from the 'woo_slg_verify' vulnerable parameter. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject a PHP Object. No known POP chain is present in the vulnerable software. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it could allow the attacker to delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code.

item.title: CVE-2024-7027|2024-07-24T13:29:26.192Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20pdf%20vouchers
item.description: The WooCommerce - PDF Vouchers plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 4.9.3. This is due to insufficient verification on the user being supplied during a QR code login through the plugin. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing Voucher Vendor user on the site, if they have access to the user id.

item.title: CVE-2024-6756|2024-07-24T13:20:16.533Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: The Social Auto Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'wpw_auto_poster_get_image_path' function in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.14. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level and above permissions, to upload arbitrary files on the affected site's server which may make remote code execution possible. An attacker can use CVE-2024-6754 to exploit with subscriber-level access.

item.title: CVE-2024-6636|2024-07-24T13:26:28.109Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'woo_slg_login_email' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the default role to Administrator while registering for an account.

item.title: CVE-2024-6753|2024-07-24T13:36:25.304Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: The Social Auto Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘mapTypes’ parameter in the 'wpw_auto_poster_map_wordpress_post_type' AJAX function in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.14 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-37502|2024-07-24T13:29:16.760Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20social%20login
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in wpweb WooCommerce Social Login.This issue affects WooCommerce Social Login: from n/a through 2.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-6636|2024-07-23T13:57:53.882Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'woo_slg_login_email' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the default role to Administrator while registering for an account.

item.title: CVE-2024-6637|2024-07-20T07:37:52.405Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthenticated privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This is due to a lack of brute force controls on a weak one-time password. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to brute force the one-time password for any user, except an Administrator, if they know the email of user.

item.title: CVE-2024-6636|2024-07-20T07:38:04.704Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'woo_slg_login_email' function in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the default role to Administrator while registering for an account.

item.title: CVE-2024-6635|2024-07-20T07:38:03.542Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This is due to insufficient controls in the 'woo_slg_login_email' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, excluding an administrator, if they know the email of user.

item.title: CVE-2024-37502|2024-07-09T08:57:03.319Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20social%20login
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in wpweb WooCommerce Social Login.This issue affects WooCommerce Social Login: from n/a through 2.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-5871|2024-06-15T03:35:11.306Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.2 via deserialization of untrusted input from the 'woo_slg_verify' vulnerable parameter. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject a PHP Object. No known POP chain is present in the vulnerable software. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it could allow the attacker to delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code.

item.title: CVE-2024-5868|2024-06-15T03:35:10.691Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Email Verification in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.2 via the use of insufficiently random activation code. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bypass the email verification.

item.title: CVE-2024-5868|2024-06-17T14:19:22.451Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Email Verification in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.2 via the use of insufficiently random activation code. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to bypass the email verification.

item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection in all versions up to, and including, 2.6.2 via deserialization of untrusted input from the 'woo_slg_verify' vulnerable parameter. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject a PHP Object. No known POP chain is present in the vulnerable software. If a POP chain is present via an additional plugin or theme installed on the target system, it could allow the attacker to delete arbitrary files, retrieve sensitive data, or execute code.

item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in wpweb WooCommerce Social Login.This issue affects WooCommerce Social Login: from n/a through 2.6.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-6635|2024-07-22T20:38:42.335Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to authentication bypass in versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This is due to insufficient controls in the 'woo_slg_login_email' function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to log in as any existing user on the site, excluding an administrator, if they know the email of user.

item.title: CVE-2024-6637|2024-07-23T20:34:59.434Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20-%20social%20login
item.description: The WooCommerce - Social Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthenticated privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 2.7.3. This is due to a lack of brute force controls on a weak one-time password. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to brute force the one-time password for any user, except an Administrator, if they know the email of user.

item.title: CVE-2024-6755|2024-07-24T14:58:33.607Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: The Social Auto Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification and loss of data due to a missing capability check on the ‘wpw_auto_poster_quick_delete_multiple’ function in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.14. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to delete arbitrary posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-6754|2024-07-24T20:04:10.251Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: The Social Auto Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data to a missing capability check on the ‘wpw_auto_poster_update_tweet_template’ function in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.14. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update arbitrary post metadata.

item.title: CVE-2024-6751|2024-07-24T20:03:21.057Z -- wpweb -- social%20auto%20poster
item.description: The Social Auto Poster plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 5.3.14. This is due to missing or incorrect nonce validation on multiple functions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to add, modify, or delete post meta and plugin options.

item.title: CVE-2024-39651|2024-08-13T10:49:07.588Z -- wpweb -- woocommerce%20pdf%20vouchers
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in WPWeb WooCommerce PDF Vouchers allows File Manipulation.This issue affects WooCommerce PDF Vouchers: from n/a before 4.9.5.
